name: MRSAColonizationOrInfectionICD9CM
title: MRSA Colonization or Infection ICD9CM
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values identifies patients who have a Methicillin resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) infection.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have a MRSA infection.  Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Diagnosis category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only use codes which represent MRSA infection.  Codes used are to be ICD9CM only.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes that do not meet the inclusion criteria.)

concept.display: Methicillin resistant Staphylococcus aureus in conditions classified elsewhere and of unspecified site

contains.display: Methicillin resistant Staphylococcus aureus in conditions classified elsewhere and of unspecified site
